# BindPath.Part.jointTransforms

**Case**

A path component to animate joint transforms.

## Declaration

```swift
case jointTransforms
```

## Discussion

This path component terminates an array of components, and at the same time specifies the entity’s joint transforms that animate.

This BindTarget references a Transform type

## Choosing the path component

- **BindPath.Part.anchorEntity(_:)**: A path component for the scene’s anchor entity.
- **BindPath.Part.entity(_:)**: A path component for a nested entity.
- **BindPath.Part.parameter(_:)**: A path component to animate a named parameter.
- **BindPath.Part.scene(_:)**: A path component for a nested scene.
- **BindPath.Part.transform**: A path component to animate a transform.
